body_html:
It would be nice to fix this, although it isn't new. Summing a ByteTensor first converts it to a LongTensor. 340_340_74498*8 bytes = 64 GB.

I would be more than happy to fix it. I need some minor guidance, since I am new to c->python code. Could you point me to sum() implementation - where is the corresponding C code?
